MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly, affecting properties in Mid Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 9.34AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.16AM on 27 February 2021.
